Alex Kennedy is Skeptical Minorem Speaker with Magic who Works the Back Alleys

Tier: 1
Effort: 1
Armor: 0
XP: 3

Might: 12 / 12 (0)
Speed: 12 / 12 (0)
Intellect: 16 / 16 (2)

Addiction: 2

Recovery 1d6 + Tier

  • Action
  • 10 Minutes
  • 1 hour
  • 10 hours

Damage Track

  • Impaired (effort costs +1, extra damage only +1)
  • Debilitated (no actions other than move)

Skills

  • practiced: light weapons, occult knowledge
  • trained: performance (guitar/singing), Stealth, deception, persuasion, identifying, seeing through a trick, an illusion, a rhetorical ruse designed to evade the issue, or a lie (with concentration), dream lore, knowledge and interpretations, sleep and mixing natural elixirs to help creatures fall asleep
  • specialized: deceiving
  • inability: heavy weapons, medium weapons, might defense

Asset
*

Power Shifts

  • Power: Use of a specific power, including damage (3 additional points per shift) but not attack rolls -> Fast Talk
  • Dexterity: Movement, acrobatics, initiative, and Speed defense

Abilities

  • Dreamcraft (132) - (1 intellect)
  • Fast Talk (138) - (1 intellect)
  • Hedge Magic (149) - (1 intellect)
  • Premonition (171) - (2 intellect)
  • Rune Caster

Cyphers (2)

  • L3 Hunter/seeker: With long-range movement, this intelligent missile tracks and attacks a specified target (target must be within sight when selected). If it misses, it continues to attack one additional time per cypher level until it hits. For example, a level 4 hunter/seeker will attack a maximum of five times. Inflicts 8 points of damage. (390) (MANIFEST)
  • L6 Armor reinforcer: The user's Armor gains for twenty-four hours. (384) (MANIFEST)

Runes:

  • [-] Personal Veil: asset to staying hidden around mundanes
  • [-] Perception: asset to seeing through to the occult
  • [-] Fearless Heart: grants an asset to initiative
  • Contain Magic: no game mechanic
  • Mind Shield: an asset to intellect defense tasks
  • Prophylactic: specialized game mechanics

Notes
*

Attacks

  • Light Hand Gun (l), short 2 damage, eased

Player Intrusions (1XP)

  • Friendly NPC: An NPC you don't know, someone you don't know that well, or someone you know but who hasn't been particularly friendly in the past chooses to help you, though doesn't necessarily explain why. Maybe they'll ask you for a favor in return afterward, depending on how much trouble they go to.
  • Perfect Suggestion: A follower or other already-friendly NPC suggests a course of action with regard to an urgent question, problem, or obstacle you're facing.
  • Unexpected Gift: An NPC hands you a physical gift you were not expecting, one that helps put the situation at ease if things seem strained, or provides you with a new insight for understanding the context of the situation if there's something you're failing to understand or grasp.

Personality

Alex is outgoing and a control freak.

Background and Story

Age: Young Adult (25)

Alex was born to a Venatori mother and a Sussuri Father. He is able to fit in with most of his peers as long as they don't know who his father is. He grew up in a stable environment but choses to balk the establishment and all their rules. He aims to misbehave.

Alex is allergic to bee stings and honey (deathly allergic).

Alex's Father is a Traveling Shaman in a rock back (Eternal Eclipse).

Character Arcs

Long Term Arc

  • Solve a Mystery (249) -> What are they after?
    • Uncover a plot for stealing a dangerous magic artifact.
    • Go rogue
    • Follow your first clue

Appearance

Hair: inky black hair short on the sides, long enough for a faux mohawk on top
Eyes: ice blue eyes
Height: 6'0"
Build: Athletic build, broad shoulders

He has a kanji tattoo on his left hip signifying luck, a tear out robotic arm on his right shoulder covering the Venatori contain magic rune, and on his chest a tattoo of a yin-yang symbol in the background and a green Chinese dragon circling a Bengal tiger covering the perception and fearless heart tattoo, and an intricate red and orange phoenix across his back that covers the perception rune. A small delicate rune is inked on his the inside of his right hip bone, since getting the rune he's never deactivated it.

Alex wears comfortable stylish clothes, typically seen in jeans and a t-shirt with combat boots. But he can wear a suit well.

Relationships

Person Relationship Notes

Character Journal

Tier 1

Descriptor: Skeptical

SKEPTICAL

You possess a questioning attitude regarding claims that are often taken for granted by others. You're not necessarily a "doubting Thomas" (a skeptic who refuses to believe anything without direct personal experience), but you've often benefited from questioning the statements, opinions, and received knowledge presented to you by others. (55)

You gain the following characteristics:

  • Insightful: +2 to your Intellect Pool
  • Skill: You're trained in identifying.
  • Skill: You're trained in all actions that involve seeing through a trick, an illusion, a rhetorical ruse designed to evade the issue, or a lie. For example, you're better at keeping your eye on the cup containing the hidden ball, sensing an illusion, or realizing if someone is lying to you (but only if you specifically concentrate and use this skill).

Initial Link to the Starting Adventure: From the following list of options, choose how you became involved in the first adventure.

You were following one of the other PCs because you were suspicious of him, which brought you into the action.

Type: Speaker

  • Might 8 -> 10
  • Speed 9 -> 10
  • Intellect 11 -> 14
  • 6 points
  • Effort 1
  • Edge 1 Intellect
  • Cyphers 2
  • Equipment: Appropriate clothing and a light weapon of your choice, plus two expensive items, two moderately priced items, and up to four inexpensive items.
  • Weapons: You can use light weapons without penalty. You have an inability with medium and heavy weapons; your attacks with medium and heavy weapons are hindered.
  • Anecdote
  • Enthrall
  • Fast Talk (138)
  • Interaction Skills (155) -> deceiving, persuading

Background: You were inducted into a secret society that claims to hold and protect esoteric knowledge opposing the forces of evil.
